subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Terry Murray has been hired as the new coach of the Los Angeles Kings. A team spokesman said Murray would be introduced Thursday at a news conference. Murray coached the Philadelphia Flyers to the Stanley Cup finals 11 years ago. He has been an assistant coach with the Flyers since the 2003-4 season. Murray will succeed Marc Crawford, who was fired June 10 after two years on the job.
